definition: to refract/refraction/to reflect (in the figurative sense: to show the nature of)
to break (e.g. stick or bone)/a loss
to turn sth over/to turn upside down/to tip sth out (of a container)

to break/to fracture/to snap/to suffer loss/to bend/to twist/to turn/to change direction/convinced/to convert into (currency)/discount/rebate/tenth (in price)/classifier for theatrical scenes/to fold/accounts book

sentences.english: In addition, the number of the zenith delay parameters has effect on the tropospheric refraction.
sentences.chinese: 天顶延迟参数个数的选择对对流层折射有较大影响。

sentences.english: Anomalous refraction is believed to be the main error source for classical astrometry.
sentences.chinese: 反常折射已成为传统天体测量学的主要误差来源。

sentences.english: When he notices for the first time the faint.
sentences.chinese: 他第一次在圆形杯底的折射之中。

sentences.english: That reflected in the thick snow on the sun, my happiness reflects the chest.
sentences.chinese: 那映在厚厚雪地上的阳光，将我的快乐折射出胸膛。

sentences.english: This is sunlight refracted through our atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 这些是从地球大气层中折射出的光线。
通常，万圣节服装会折射出流行文化的潮流趋势。

sentences.english: Longitudinal and transverse modulators, photorefractive effect, real-time holography.
sentences.chinese: 纵向与横向调变器，光折射效应，即时全像术。

sentences.english: Nature always wears the colors of the spirit .
sentences.chinese: 自然总是折射着观者的精神状态。

sentences.english: The tropospheric atmosphere refractivity of different laser wave length is expatiated.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了对流层不同波长激光的大气折射率。

sentences.english: I remember as a child seeing them through my small backyard refractor and it was unmistakable.
sentences.chinese: 我记得小时候用我的小折射镜看它们，是如此的明显。

sentences.english: Advantageously, the structure further comprises a gradient refractive index layer.
sentences.chinese: 有利的是，该结构进一步包括梯度折射系数层。

sentences.english: Relating to or characterized by double refraction .
sentences.chinese: 关于或具有双折射特征。

sentences.english: A refracting panel consisting of one or more, usually cylindrical, fresnel lenses.
sentences.chinese: 由一个或多个圆柱形菲涅尔透镜组成的折射系统。

sentences.english: From the results obtained, it is evident that the crystalline lens has birefringence.
sentences.chinese: 从实验结果得知牛眼晶状体具有双折射的性能。

sentences.english: The destruction of Greenred's love and youth mirrors the irretrievable tragedy of one generation.
sentences.chinese: 青红爱情与青春的毁灭折射出一代人无法回旋的悲剧。

definition: to reflect/reflection (from a mirror etc)/reflex (i.e. automatic reaction of organism)
to shine on/(math., linguistics etc) mapping
to transmit/transmission (of radiation through a medium)/passage
to shine on/to light up/to irradiate
to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
